verses.name: Ecclesiastes 11:5
verses.text: As thou knowest not what is the way of the spirit, nor how the bones do grow in the womb of her that is with child: even so thou knowest not the works of God who maketh all.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 11:6
verses.text: In the morning sow thy seed, and in the evening withhold not thine hand: for thou knowest not whether shall prosper, either this or that, or whether they both shall be alike good.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 11:7
verses.text: Truly the light is sweet, and a pleasant thing it is for the eyes to behold the sun:
